0111000000100001 1101110000000001 0 -> sum: 0100110000100010, cout: 1

1111001101010011 1010011110011110 0 -> sum: 1001101011110001, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
